name: The Headless Horde
description:
In this apocalyptic wasteland, survive and fight through waves of horror, fight with multiple weapons and shred through the hordes in this new take on the zombies franchise. Headless Horde. Have fun and remember to not die!

You'll start by choosing your load out from the selected weapons available in your armoury, then you'll be launched into the fight. 

Controls:

Movement is the usual W,A,S and D

Reload is R

Using grenade will be Q

Shooting will be Right mouse button or RMB.
